62 #define AMD_CATCH_AND_RETHROW(STRUCT_NAME,FUNC_NAME) \
63  catch (const AMD::Exception& error) { \
64  /* Append append the information and throw again */ \
65  const_cast<AMD::Exception&>(error).appendTrace \
66  (": from " #STRUCT_NAME"::"#FUNC_NAME " at " FILE_AND_LINE()); \
67  error.rethrow (); \
68  } catch (const std::exception& error) { \
69  /* Wrap it up in a exception_generic_impl */ \
70  std::string prevTrace (typeid (error).name()); \
71  prevTrace += ": from " #STRUCT_NAME"::"#FUNC_NAME " at " FILE_AND_LINE();\
72  throw ::AMD::ExceptionImpl::convert \
73  (prevTrace.c_str(), error.what(), \
74  static_cast<AMD::error_code_type>(AMD_ERROR)); \
75  } catch (...) { \
76  throw ::AMD::ExceptionImpl \
77  (#STRUCT_NAME"::"#FUNC_NAME " at " FILE_AND_LINE(), \
78  "Unknown error", \
79  static_cast<AMD::error_code_type>(AMD_ERROR)); \
80  }
81 
83 #define AMD_CATCH_AND_PRINT() \
84  catch (const ::AMD::Exception& error) { \
85  std::cout << "error.what() : " << error.what() << "\n"\
86  << "error.trace(): " << error.trace() << "\n" \
87  << "error.code() : " << error.code() << "\n"; \
88  }
